entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
